html:
311 U.S. 615

61 S.Ct. 67

85 L.Ed. 390

WEST INDIA OIL COMPANY (Puerto Rico), petitioner,
v.
Rafael SANCHO Bonet, Treasurer of Puerto Rico.

No. 26.

Supreme Court of the United States

October 23, 1940

Mr. James R. Beverley, of San Juan, P. R., for petitioner.

1

Manuel V. Domenech, present Treasurer of Puerto Rico substituted as the party respondent herein in the place and stead of Rafael Sancho Bonet, former Treasurer, on motion of Mr. James R. Beverley for the petitioner.
